app_descript:
Developmental Disabilities

The Developmental Disabilities app is an essential resource for healthcare professionals and caregivers, providing streamlined access to the 2018 Canadian Consensus Guidelines for Primary Care of Adults with Developmental Disabilities. This user-friendly app transforms crucial guidelines into an easily navigable format, ensuring that users can promptly find the information they need to improve care for individuals with developmental disabilities.
